eventDecorators.name: LogApprovedProposal
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: LogDeposit
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: LogProposeDelistWhiteList
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: LogProposeUpdateCoreParameters
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: LogProposeUpdateIncentive
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: LogProposeUpdateWhiteList
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: LogUpdateCoreParameters
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: LogWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal. Triggers on new deposit call.

functionDecorators.name: applyGovernanceForDelistWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Apply the delisting proposal if admitted.

functionDecorators.name: applyGovernanceForUpdateCore
functionDecorators.description: Apply the updating core parameters proposal if admitted.

functionDecorators.name: applyGovernanceForUpdateIncentive
functionDecorators.description: Apply the updating incentive proposal if admitted.

functionDecorators.name: applyGovernanceForUpdateWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Apply the listing proposal if admitted.

functionDecorators.name: getInfoDelistWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Get the info of the delisting proposal.

functionDecorators.name: getInfoUpdateCoreParameters
functionDecorators.description: Get the info of the updating core parameters proposal.

functionDecorators.name: getInfoUpdateIncentive
functionDecorators.description: Get the info of the updating incentive proposal.

functionDecorators.name: getInfoUpdateWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Get the info of the listing proposal.

functionDecorators.name: getProposals
functionDecorators.description: Get the status of multiple proposals.

parameterDecorators.name: offset
parameterDecorators.description: is a proposal index. If 0 is given, this function searches from the latest proposal.

parameterDecorators.name: limit
parameterDecorators.description: is the number of proposals you query. If 0 is given, this function returns all proposals.

returnDecorators.name: allProposals
returnDecorators.description: which is the list of the from `[..., proposeId_k, votingResult_k, otherProposalStatus_k, ...]` (k = offset, ..., offset - limit + 1), where votingResult_k is the binary of the form. `currentApprovalVoteSum_k << 128 | currentDenialVoteSum_k` and otherProposalStatus_k is the binary of the form. `appliedMinimumVote_k << 128 | preVoteDeadline_k << 96 | mainVoteDeadline_k << 64 | expiration_k << 32 | lockin_k << 24 | applied_k << 16`.

functionDecorators.name: getStatus
functionDecorators.description: Get the current status of the proposal.

functionDecorators.name: getUserStatus
functionDecorators.description: Get the deposit amount of the user for the proposal.

functionDecorators.name: lockinProposal
functionDecorators.description: Check and mark flag if the proposal collects minimum vote amount within the pre vote period and the proposal will be accepted if the approval vote is larger than denial vote after the end of the main vote period.

functionDecorators.name: proposeDelistWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Propose delisting the tokenAddress from the whitelist. The proposer needs to commit minimum deposit amount.

functionDecorators.name: proposeUpdateCoreParameters
functionDecorators.description: Propose delisting the tokenAddress from the whitelist. The proposer needs to commit minimum deposit amount.

functionDecorators.name: proposeUpdateIncentiveFund
functionDecorators.description: Propose updating the incentive addresses and their allocation. The proposer needs to commit minimum deposit amount.

functionDecorators.name: proposeUpdateWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Propose updating the whitelist. The proposer needs to commit minimum deposit amount.

functionDecorators.name: vote
functionDecorators.description: Approve or deny the proposal by commit. The voter should hold the amount in the staking contract.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw deposit after the end of the proposal.
